org.daisy.pipeline.client.models

Class Script

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.client.models.Script
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Script>

    public class Script
extends Object
implements Comparable<Script>
    A representation of a Pipeline 2 script.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Script(Node scriptXml)
      Parse the script described by the provided XML document/node.
      Script(String href)
      Create a script element with only a href attribute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Script

        public Script(Node scriptXml)
       throws Pipeline2Exception
        Parse the script described by the provided XML document/node. Example: http://daisy-pipeline.googlecode.com/hg/webservice/samples/xml-formats/script.xml
        Parameters:
        scriptXml - The XML
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown when an error occurs

      • Script

        public Script(String href)
       throws Pipeline2Exception
        Create a script element with only a href attribute.
        Parameters:
        href - the script URL
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown when an error occurs

      • parseScriptsXml

        public static List<Script> parseScriptsXml(Node scriptsXml)
                                    throws Pipeline2Exception
        Parse the list of scripts described by the provided XML document/node. Example: http://daisy-pipeline.googlecode.com/hg/webservice/samples/xml-formats/scripts.xml
        Parameters:
        scriptsXml - The XML
        Returns:
        A list of the scripts
        Throws:
        Pipeline2Exception - thrown when an error occurs
